_source.short_desc: The world's best online booking software for the beauty and wellness industry. Unlimited possibilities, subscription-free.
_source.long_desc: Fresha is the only subscription-free appointment booking software for beauty and wellness. Everyone gets unlimited bookings, locations, team members and notifications. Boost your sales and attract new clients by accepting online bookings directly through Google search, your Facebook and Instagram pages, and your website. Clients are easily kept up to date via automated texts, emails and the mobile app. Fresha has zero monthly fees with optional paid features, including card payment processing.
_source.target_audience: Over 250,000 beauty and wellness professionals across the globe trust Fresha to power their businesses. It is the world's most popular booking software for salons, barbershops and spas.

media.caption: Fresha client booking through mobile app
Get bookings 24/7 with real-time slot availability and gain online reviews to boost your brand.

category_features.name: Activities Booking
category_features.definition: Allows businesses to offer customers reservations for a variety of activities.

category_features.name: Booking Notes
category_features.definition: Keep notes on the specifics of a reservation including customer information and special requests

category_features.definition: Provide online support for your customers through live chat or help desk functionality

category_features.definition: The ability to reserve times in groups.

category_features.definition: Design, communicate, and distribute incentives to perform a specific action

category_features.name: Rate Management
category_features.definition: Track/optimize rates in relation to usage

category_features.name: Room Booking
category_features.definition: Reserve available meeting space to avoid conflicts and  to inform everyone involved on where their meetings will be held

category_features.definition: Allows bookings to be made through a third party service.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Save time, look professional, and keep your customers and business moving with Acuity's self-service reservation-booking magic. From the moment a customer books with you, Acuity's there to perform customer intake, automatically send customized email confirmations to you and your customers, deliver text reminders, and process payments. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly. There's even a mobile app, for to manage when you're on-the-go. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Organizers of events of all sizes use Eventbrite to power their live experience.
related_products.features: Eventbrite is a ticketing and event technology platform that helps businesses organize and sell tickets to events online  while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From workshops to concerts to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. Eventbrites powerful platform, which can be accessed online or via mobile apps, scales from basic registration and ticketing to a fully featured event management platform.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody reservations and business software simplifies online appointment and reservation scheduling with automatic reminders.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for all service companies! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.
related_products.features: SimplyBook.me offers the most extensive online booking system on the market, one that makes you look professional and solves all your online needs. You get a full blown booking website, or a widget for your own website, where you can present your business and accept appointments, sell products, membership, packs, gift cards and service add-ons. Manage your business with one solution; website, accept bookings, marketing initiatives, business statistics and,online and on site payments (POS).

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based online booking, scheduling, point of sale and marketing software - everything you need to make your life easier.
related_products.features: Booker's cutting-edge salon software helps your run and grow your salon with an all-in-one platform that understands you'd rather be focusing on your clients instead of your administrative duties. Manage your online bookings, point-of-sale, membership and loyalty programs, all while attracting new clients, and making sure they come back. Access your salon business anytime, anywhere, all on Booker's secure, cost-effective, cloud-based software.

related_products.short_desc: Setmore offers a free, online scheduling platform for you to connect with your customers.
related_products.features:
Setmore offers a free, online scheduling platform for you to connect with your customers. Manage all your appointments through one simple, sleek calendar system and give your business the freedom to grow. 

Bring on more customers and sharpen your brand image, while taking charge of your working hours. By listing your availability online, your customers can self-book their desired services. Focus on providing an excellent customer experience and let Setmore handle the paperwork.

related_products.short_desc: Peek Pro is an end to end solution for tour and activity operators to be able to run their businesses on and off their mobile devices
related_products.features: Peek Pro is an online reservation system that empowers activity operators to increase their revenue, save tons of time, and provide the absolute best service for their customers. Operators are especially wowed by our industry-leading mobile apps and the intuitive design of our back-office system. Features includes daily payouts, automated emails, resource & channel management, QR code scanning, gift certificates, free waivers, 20+ customizable reports, and so much more.

related_products.short_desc: Xola is an easy-to-use reservation, sales, and marketing system for tour and activity operators.
related_products.features: Xola is the only unified reservation, sales, and marketing platform for tour and activity businesses. Manage every kind of reservation (online, over the phone, in-person, or from a reseller) with real-time availability. Sell through the world's largest marketplaces in a few clicks. Increase online revenue with automated abandoned booking remarketing features and track your marketing success in easily with our Facebook Pixel and Google Analytics integrations. CC rates as low as 1.99% + 30 cents.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based property management and reservation management system for campgrounds, RV parks, and marinas.
related_products.features: RMS is a top-rated hospitality management platform that offers centralized, easy-to-use software for campgrounds, RV parks, and marinas. Some of the key features include an inbuilt channel manager, dynamic pricing, an online booking engine and revenue management capabilities. With over 35 years of experience in hospitality technology, RMS has helped over 6,000 properties across the globe achieve increased revenue and operational efficiencies.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify FOH busywork while growing your following with our high-intent network, so you can focus on the guest.
related_products.features: Yelp Guest Manager helps restaurants manage all of their front-of-house operations across the entire dining experience through one fully integrated solution - by bringing together Yelp Waitlist, Reservations, Kiosk, Takeout, Table Management, online brand building and more into one product. Yelp Guest Manager combines Yelp's high-intent diner network with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations from takeout and delivery orders to dine-in seating.

related_products.short_desc: Online booking, resource scheduling, lead generation, and reporting solution for Fitness Studios.
related_products.features:
WellnessLiving, an all-in-one business management software, has all the tools you need to attract, convert, & retain more clients. 

We offer the fitness & wellness industry an affordable, easy-to-use, fully customizable platform that streamlines business management. Dynamic tools include online booking solutions, POS, payroll, reputation management, email/SMS marketing suite, rewards program, robust reporting, and so much more! It's the only software you need to run and grow your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Hotel software that lets every small property easily create & manage reservations and check guests in & out, even on-the-go!
similar_products.features: Trusted by the most small properties globally, Little Hotelier is the all-in-one platform to help you manage your reservations with ease. Bookings are sent straight to an easy-to-use calendar, & you can even set up automated guest communications. We'll keep all your channels & inventory in sync, ensuring everything auto-updates whenever a booking is made to eliminate double bookings & save time on manual work. Try free for 30 days. No Credit Card. Cancel anytime.

similar_products.short_desc: innRoad is an award-winning, all-in-one property management system designed to meet the needs of hospitality businesses of all sizes.
similar_products.features: innRoad's award-winning property management system is trusted by thousands of hoteliers around the world. This all-in-one software is specifically designed to save time, increase occupancy, boost revenue and provide guests with a seamless booking experience. Customers report a 20% increase in direct bookings and a 10% increase in room revenue when switching to innRoad. innRoad's all in one solution offers 24/7 live support, unlimited training, new monthly features, and free data migration.

similar_products.short_desc: The hotel commerce platform with everything you need to succeed. Sell, market, manage and grow your hotel - from one place.
similar_products.features: 33,000 hoteliers trust SiteMinder for smart and simple reservation management. With over 2 million reservations annually, coupled with the world's most powerful channel manager and an ecosystem of 700+ of the industry's best channels and applications, SiteMinder helps hotels of all sizes acquire guests, drive profit and manage property operations with ease.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based property management and reservation management system for campgrounds, RV parks, and marinas.
similar_products.features: RMS is a top-rated hospitality management platform that offers centralized, easy-to-use software for campgrounds, RV parks, and marinas. Some of the key features include an inbuilt channel manager, dynamic pricing, an online booking engine and revenue management capabilities. With over 35 years of experience in hospitality technology, RMS has helped over 6,000 properties across the globe achieve increased revenue and operational efficiencies.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based reservation software that allows you to control every aspect of your property. Easily manage reservations and rate plans.
similar_products.features: Cloudbeds is all-in-one reservation management software where you can manage reservations, rate plans, reporting, emails, and more all from one login. With our dashboard, you get an overview what?s happening today and what needs to be done tomorrow. Manage reservations with our intuitive drag-and-drop calendar and check guests in or out with ease. All movements are connected to reports that are built right into the interface with Cloudbeds so you and your staff are always in sync.

similar_products.short_desc: NewBook's leading reservation software can help you increase your direct online bookings by up to 600%!
similar_products.features: Need an easier way to take reservations? NewBook's Online Booking Engine has helped our users increase their direct bookings by up to 600%! Our reservation software comes complete with intelligent upselling tools, a mobile-friendly interface, and a streamlined booking experience your guests will love. Discover site selection tools, add-ons and activity bookings, and countless more features.

similar_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
similar_products.features: Save time, look professional, and keep your customers and business moving with Acuity's self-service reservation-booking magic. From the moment a customer books with you, Acuity's there to perform customer intake, automatically send customized email confirmations to you and your customers, deliver text reminders, and process payments. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly. There's even a mobile app, for to manage when you're on-the-go. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

similar_products.short_desc: Centralize reservations, manage your inventories online, process payments and get unified access to leading distribution channels.
similar_products.features: Checkfront is a booking management platform trusted by thousands of tour operators worldwide. Our platform empowers businesses to sell tours and activities on any website by providing live inventory management, dynamic pricing, customer notifications, and channel distribution. Checkfront makes it easy to grow your business by automating your administration and housing all your business tools in one place.

similar_products.short_desc: Meet Dayful, software that takes the hard work out of reservations, payments & admin, while you focus on what matters most to you.
similar_products.features: Meet Dayful, the all-in-one reservation software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you have more time to focus on what matters most to you. Let clients easily make reservations 24/7 online or with a handy mobile app-and reduce no-shows with automated confirmations & reminders. Better manage your business with a powerful calendar, time-saving automations and features built with your clients in mind. Be the best kind of busy with Dayful.

similar_products.short_desc: rezStream offers an easy-to-use solution that captures more reservations online AND simplifies how you manage operations.
similar_products.features:
Partner with rezStream for a Cloud-based property management system and online booking engine. Our modern solution will simplify the way you manage your day-to-day operations AND drive more bookings! Schedule automatic emails, easily set and manage rates, offer contactless check-ins, and connect to over 80 OTAs with our channel manager. 

We offer a true one-stop-shop Suite offering with a 99% customer satisfaction rating and 24/7 support. Schedule your demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Square Appointments is an all-in-one scheduling POS for booking, payments, and team management.
similar_products.features: Running a business is hard enough, especially if you're juggling multiple tools to do different things. Square Appointments is an integrated POS that comes with online scheduling and payment processing so that you can run your whole business from one place. It's a one-stop-shop solution that helps you save time and stay organized because it's customized for businesses who run on appointments. Square Appointments is now free for individuals, and really affordable for teams.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully automate your guest experience & entire operation. For the first time, all-in-one place, all-in-one system.
similar_products.features:
Consolidate all your apps, dashboards, fees, and providers all in one place. Jurny has built the industry's first vertically integrated system. AI pricing, smart access control, noise sensor dashboard, guest verification software, PMS, messaging, channel management, cleaning management software, online reputation tracker, and more all-in-one system, all-in-one dashboard.

Take your operation and guest experience to the next level and join us on this new wave of the hospitality revolution.

similar_products.short_desc: The Flybook was founded in 2006 and manages reservations and operations for adventure parks, ziplines, tour, and rental providers.
similar_products.features: The Flybook helps adventure parks, ziplines, tour and rental providers manage their reservations and business operation. Founded in 2006, we are the original cloud-based software for the activity industry. The Flybook offers solutions for those who need more out of their reservation software: from managing multiple locations, to fine tuning and customizing offerings to fit your business model. Above all else, our advisory team is second to none, and we strive to be your closest business partner.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Airline Reservation System software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Airline Reservation System tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Airline Reservation System helps airline operators distribute tickets across multiple channels and optimize bookings for upcoming flights.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Scheduling software streamlines the process of scheduling clients, patients, and meetings. This type of software promotes efficiency by eliminating double-bookings and automating scheduling of recurring appointments. It also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and provide clients with the most suitable appointment options. Appointment Scheduling software often includes reminder tools that help ensure timely attendance of scheduled meetings and appointments. Appointment Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Medical Scheduling software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospitality Property Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospitality Property Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospitality Property Management software automates the marketing, booking and billing of rooms for hotels, motels and resorts. Hotel managers use these applications to optimize the efficiency of their operations, speeding the process of filling and turning over rooms. Hospitality Property Management solutions offer a variety of vacancy monitoring features and integration for marketing and sales tools, as well as billing functions. Management tools for other functions such as maintenance requests and housekeeping schedules are also often included. Hospitality Property Management software is related to Real Estate Property Management software, Rental software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant Management software integrates and automates accounting, scheduling and inventory control for restaurants. Restaurant Management applications typically offer a broad range of features that encompass traditional business necessities such as accounting, customer contact information, supplier data and payroll as well as restaurant-specific requirements such as table reservation management, guest management and menu costing. These applications also integrate with point of sale solutions and onsite or online credit card processing systems. Restaurant Management software is related to Food Service Distribution software and Food Service Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Tour Operator software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Tour Operator tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Tour Operator software manages packages, customers, ticketing, and itineraries for tour operators, vacation package companies, destination marketers, and transit companies. Tour Operator applications assist in generating price quotes, developing itineraries, and managing reservations for tour customers. They also assist tour operators in automating their business processes, such as accounting, invoicing, marketing, and business reporting. Tour Operator software is related to Reservations software and Travel Agency software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Travel Agency software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Travel Agency tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Travel Agency software automates the front and back office activities of travel agencies, vacation packagers, destination marketers and transit companies. These applications assist in generating price quotes, developing itineraries and managing reservations for tour customers as well as providing easy integration into third party reservation systems. Travel Agency solutions assist agencies in automating their business processes, such as accounting, invoicing, marketing and business reporting. Travel Agency software is related to Reservations software and Tour Operator software.

Join 70,000+ businesses and 250,000 professionals who use Fresha to boost their sales in 120+ countries. Fresha is a simple, flexible and powerful booking software with all the advanced features you need to run your salon. Optional paid features include integrated payment processing for deposits and no-show protection. Only pay for what you use, with zero monthly fees

related_products.short_desc: Reach more clients with the simple, customizable scheduling solution that looks and feels as good as a day at the salon.
related_products.features: With Acuity Scheduling, booking clients looks and feels as good as the services you provide for them. Customize individual calendars for your staff and locations, and set up appointment types that keep clients coming back for more, including gift certificates and multi-service bookings. Empower clients to book and pay directly from your website or social profile. Acuity will be there to automate branded emails and texts to keep your clients in the loop, on time, and in control of rescheduling.

related_products.short_desc: Level up with Zenoti, the all-in-one software solution for beauty, wellness, and fitness brands, trusted by 20,000+ businesses.
related_products.features: Zenoti gives multi-chair salons the most complete cloud-based software solution, trusted by 20,000+ beauty and wellness businesses worldwide. Salons can unify operations across locations and streamline appointment scheduling, POS, marketing, CRM, and more. Guests can book appointments, check-in, and auto-pay, all from the salon's branded mobile app. Providers and staff can view guest preferences, tips, and commissions in real-time. See how Zenoti can drive growth for your salon.

related_products.short_desc: Timely salon software runs your whole business from any device. Easily manage your calendar, clients, staff, stock, reporting & more!
related_products.features:
We're here to grow the value of the beauty industry, with you and for you. Join the Timely community of 46,000 supportive & connected beauty professionals and get access to innovative business management software, award-winning customer support, education from the biggest industry names all over the world, and support from your peers.
Timely is designed to suit your business at any size, stage and budget. We love helping you succeed, so join us today! Start a free 14-day trial at gettimely.com.

related_products.short_desc: Simple, powerful, appointment booking software for service providers and their clients. Includes online calendar and downloadable app.
related_products.features:
Simple, powerful, appointment booking tool that you and your clients will love! Use the scheduler anywhere: the app or any browser. Customers can book with ease using the Visibook app or online calendar.
Easy booking and customer tracking.
Reduce no-shows.
Individual and class scheduler.
Payments tool.
Client messaging and notes.
Simple, free set up.
Control your schedule.
Work around your personal calendar.
Less email and hassle.
Manage staff.
Multi-Platform tool.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 free salon and studio management management platform used by 8 million businesses. Cloud, mobile, open source.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 #1 free salon and studio management platform. Used by 8 million businesses worldwide. Cloud, mobile, open source. Whether you are running a yoga studio or a photo studio - Bitrix24 is free studio management software that can make your business more effective. Client management, sales management, employee management, document management, scheduling and time management ? these are just few of the tools that Bitrix24 comes with. Available in cloud and requiring no IT administrator.

similar_products.short_desc: Robust cloud solutions for beauty businesses with online booking, text notifications, commissions, reports, marketing & payments.
similar_products.features: Since 1999, DaySmart Salon has helped thousands of owners and managers grow their salon business. DaySmart was a pioneer in online booking, and our robust salon platform includes automated email and text notifications, comprehensive payroll and commissions tracking, mobile apps & much, much more.  Free data migration from most competitive programs can get you up and growing in no time.  No fees, no contracts.

similar_products.short_desc: Level up with Zenoti, the all-in-one software solution for beauty, wellness, and fitness brands, trusted by 20,000+ businesses.
similar_products.features: Zenoti gives multi-chair salons the most complete cloud-based software solution, trusted by 20,000+ beauty and wellness businesses worldwide. Salons can unify operations across locations and streamline appointment scheduling, POS, marketing, CRM, and more. Guests can book appointments, check-in, and auto-pay, all from the salon's branded mobile app. Providers and staff can view guest preferences, tips, and commissions in real-time. See how Zenoti can drive growth for your salon.

similar_products.short_desc: Use Vagaro Salon Software & Apps to get booked, process payments, send reminders and market your business. Starting Price: $25/month.
similar_products.features: Use our all-in-one salon management software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Reach more customers Text & Email Marketing. Get booked on the Vagaro Marketplace and on social media. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage appointments and packages while on the go. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

similar_products.short_desc:
The premium all-in-one software for salons.

- Marketing
- Appointments management
- Stock and staff management
- Full customer support
similar_products.features:
Phorest is an all-in-one solution to enable hair, beauty, or personal services businesses to reach their full potential.  From seamless online salon booking, hassle-free reporting, or the industry's most innovative marketing features.

Track your teams performance, win back lapsing clients with automatic, targeted messages and get your clients in more often with your own branded salon booking app and salon loyalty cards. And stand out by generating reviews with our automated reputation tool!

similar_products.short_desc: Boulevard delivers a modern Client Experience Platform with everything you need to manage, market, and grow your salon.
similar_products.features: Build your brand. Excite your staff. Grow your profits. From initial booking to final payment, Boulevard's salon management software delivers delightful client experiences for hair, lash, and beauty salons. Personalize every appointment and exceed every expectation with a complete, modern solution designed for the work you do. Visit joinblvd.com to get a demo. For a limited time, save $500 now!

similar_products.short_desc: FOR 5+ SERVICE PROVIDERS: The smartest software for salons. Reduce overhead costs with fast workflows and smart automations.
similar_products.features:
FOR 5+ SERVICE PROVIDERS: The smartest software for independent salons. 

From contactless checkout, to one of the easiest and most intuitive online-booking solutions, Mangomint is designed to save time and reduce overhead costs.

What sets Mangomint apart from other salon software are insanely fast workflows, excellent design, and smart automations.

similar_products.short_desc: Meet Dayful, the salon software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments & admin, while you focus on your clients.
similar_products.features: Meet Dayful, the all-in-one software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you have more time to focus on making clients feel their best. Let your clients easily book treatments 24/7 online or with a handy mobile app-and reduce no-shows with automated confirmations & reminders. Better manage your salon with a powerful calendar, time-saving automations and features built with your clients in mind. Be the best kind of busy with Dayful.

similar_products.short_desc: Crush your goals and grow your business in a customizable, easy-to-use salon software built specifically for the beauty industry.
similar_products.features: Meevo is the award-winning salon and spa software powered by Millennium built specifically for the beauty industry to simplify client management, improve business operations, and enhance your marketing strategies. Crush your goals and grow your business in one completely customizable, easy-to-use platform with a 98.5% positive support rating from more than 350,000 users. You'll gain best-in-class, 5-star support from the moment you join the Meevo Community.

similar_products.short_desc: Square Appointments is an all-in-one scheduling POS for booking, payments, and team management.
similar_products.features: Running a business is hard enough, especially if you're juggling multiple tools to do different things. Square Appointments is an integrated POS that comes with online scheduling and payment processing so that you can run your whole business from one place. It's a one-stop-shop solution that helps you save time and stay organized because it's customized for businesses who run on appointments. Square Appointments is now free for individuals, and really affordable for teams.

similar_products.short_desc: Reach more clients with the simple, customizable scheduling solution that looks and feels as good as a day at the salon.
similar_products.features: With Acuity Scheduling, booking clients looks and feels as good as the services you provide for them. Customize individual calendars for your staff and locations, and set up appointment types that keep clients coming back for more, including gift certificates and multi-service bookings. Empower clients to book and pay directly from your website or social profile. Acuity will be there to automate branded emails and texts to keep your clients in the loop, on time, and in control of rescheduling.

similar_products.short_desc: Envision Salon & Spa software offers everything you need to take care of your business so you can take care of your clients.
similar_products.features: Envision Salon & Spa Management System is an all-in-one solution for business management. Envision covers business basics like booking and reporting while offering innovative features such as automated marketing and reputation management. The system is easy to learn and use which allows for your clients to be your top priority.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your salon like a pro! Check out our easy, no-nonsense app that takes a fresh look at how booking software *should* be.
similar_products.features: See why hundreds of stylists agree that MyCuts is the most user-friendly salon booking app! Best suited for booth renters to salon owners, or anyone in between that want all the benefits of a "pro" salon without all the hassle and cost! Either use our web app online or download our Android or iOS app. Our Free plan can be used as long as you want up to 25 clients and even includes email appointment confirmations. If you want unlimited clients or text confirmations, plans start at only $14/month.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Scheduling software streamlines the process of scheduling clients, patients, and meetings. This type of software promotes efficiency by eliminating double-bookings and automating scheduling of recurring appointments. It also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and provide clients with the most suitable appointment options. Appointment Scheduling software often includes reminder tools that help ensure timely attendance of scheduled meetings and appointments. Appointment Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Medical Scheduling software and Reservations software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Spa software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Spa tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Spa software automates and manages health/medical spa operations. Medical Spa (also called Med Spa or Medi Spa) solutions typically feature easy integration with cash registers, bar code readers and other point of sale hardware. Medical Spas provide treatments including skin tightening, laser hair removal, peels, liposuction, cosmetic dental work and more. Medical Spas typically use these applications to add efficiency and value to a wide variety of business processes including: appointment scheduling, online calendar, client management and marketing, employee data, commission calculation, inventory control, payroll, point of sale and others. For related products see Salon software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Spa software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Spa tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Spa software automates all aspects of business management for various types of spas, including day spas. Software functionality typically includes inventory management, appointment scheduling, gift card processing, point of sale, and other retail customer service oriented capabilities. Spa software is related to Medical Spa software and Salon Software
